lines: No evil shall enter the realm of Imladris.
What tidings do you bring to the land of Imladris?
Welcome to the last Homely House in Middle-earth, #p.
Welcome to the house of Lord Elrond, #p.
Welcome to the realm of Elrond Half-elven!
After the destruction of Eregion, our people fled north and took refuge in this valley, hidden from foul eyes.
Our Lord Elrond has kept watch over this valley for many centuries.
Elrond Half-elven safeguards this valley with the power of the elvish ring Vilya, yet if the Nameless One returns in full he could use the ring no longer.
Imladris fought alongside the Kingdom of Arnor long ago. Now the Kingdom is ruined and its people scattered, but many of their relics are held here.
You are always welcome in Imladris, #p.
The darkness that grows in the shadows will never find itself here, #p.
Lord Elrond was there 3000 years ago in the Battle of the Last alliance.
We hold many relics of the west here in Imladris.

Osgiliath has been taken, Isengard has turned to the enemy, the Woodland Realm was assulted, and The Nazgûl are roaming across Eriador! Middle-Earth has been enveloped in war, and our hope now lies on the edge of a knife.
Envoys from kingdoms all across Middle-Earth have come into Rivendell, the Nameless One gathers his forces against the free peoples.

The Nazgûl have been moving across Eriador. They attacked the Dúnedain at Sarn Ford, the town of Bree, and almost crossed the Bruinen into our lands! I fear such a bold move by the enemy could only mean one thing. The One Ring has been found.
The Rings of Power maintain the splendour of our lands, yet in the end they only prolongue our fatigue of the world.
Ai! Mae govannen, arben na Imladris!
Far have we travelled to view through Elendil's Stone.
From Imladris I came to view through the Palantír in Elostirion, yet the call of The West is ever strong now, I am not sure if I shall go back.
Welcome to Rivendell, ranger.
Ai! Mae govannen Dúnadan! Welcome to Imladris!
The Dúnedain of the North have always been welcome in our house.
We hold many relics of the Dúnedain here in Imladris.
The Sceptre of Annúminas is but one of the relics of Arnor still held in Imladris.
The Eldar of Imladris have long been friends to the Dúnedain.
The elves of Imladris were allies to the Kingdom of Arnor centuries ago before its fall.
For Imladris!
Na Imladris!
No evil may set foot in Imladris!
You may not enter Rivendell.
#p, you may not set foot in Rivendell!
The Enemy has no hold over Imladris!
Your darkness shall not poison the Last Homely House!
Na Imladris!
The Enemy has no hold over Imladris!
We suffer no evil in Imladris!
You may not bring evil here, #p!
Your shadow shall not poison our homely house!
Who brings to us this token of doom?
We shall not allow evil to enter our realm. Leave now or face our wrath!
You bring great evil here, #p. You can go no further.
Leave, #p, or face the might of our arrows!
No longer are you are welcome in our land!
I despair that we ever sheltered you in Imladris!
Bitterly now I regret welcoming you into Imladris!
